entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
